name: Harvest Festival 64
description:
Welcome to the town! Luckily for you just in time for the HARVEST FESTIVAL! Help your new friends with their preparations and ẽ̸͓͙̤͓͋̊̉n̶̥̝̈́̈̕j̶͕͖̔̉̀͝o̶̞̙͊̚y̴̻̗͜͝ͅ life!

 

With music by MODUS INTERACTIVE !

 

Controls:

KeyboardControllerMoveWASD / Arrow KeysLeft Analog Stick / D-Pad
InteractE / F / SPACE / Left MBAny Button
Toggle FullscreenALT+ENTER /

 

Made in  ~72 hours for the 52nd Ludum Dare Game Jam
